sentence.Network_en: He drove his car through the gates at full pelt.
Some of the younger men began to pelt one another with snowballs.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些年轻人开始相互投掷雪球。

sentence.Network_en: Alice leapt from the car and ran full pelt towards the emergency room.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾丽斯跳下车，拼命奔向急诊室。

jx.jx_en_mean: with great speed; as fast as possible

lj.lj_ly: I ran full pelt away from the harbour.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: either from obsolete pellet 'skin', from an Old French diminutive of pel 'skin', from Latin pellis 'skin', or a back-formation from peltry

entry.def: The pelt of an animal is its skin, which can be used to make clothing or rugs.

example.ex: ...rapidly diminishing suppliers of furs and pelts.
example.tran: 数量锐减的毛皮供应商

entry.def: If you pelt someone with things, you throw things at them.

example.ex: Some of the younger men began to pelt one another with snowballs...
example.tran: 一些年轻人开始相互投掷雪球。

example.ex: Crowds started to pelt police cars with stones.
example.tran: 人群开始向警车扔石块。

entry.def: If the rain is pelting down, or if it is pelting with rain, it is raining very hard.

example.ex: The rain now was pelting down...

entry.def: If you pelt somewhere, you run there very fast.

example.ex: Without thinking, she pelted down the stairs in her nightgown.
example.tran: 她想都没想，穿着睡衣就飞奔下了楼。

entry.def: If you do something full pelt or at full pelt, you do it very quickly indeed.

example.ex: Alice leapt from the car and ran full pelt towards the emergency room...
example.tran: 艾丽斯跳下车，拼命奔向急诊室。

example.ex: He drove his car through the gates at full pelt.

means.word_mean: 1. the dressed hairy coat of a mammal
2. body covering of a living animal
1. cast, hurl, or throw repeatedly with some missile;
2. attack and bombard with or as if with missiles;

sentences.sentence: "Put on your rain coat-- it's pouring outside!"

auth_sentence.content: He sounds like a steam locomotive at full pelt.
auth_sentence.res_content: He sounds like a steam locomotive at full pelt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He sounds like a steam locomotive at full pelt.

auth_sentence.content: The cripple...gave him...a good pelt on the head with his crutch.

auth_sentence.content: If I shoot it anywhere else it will ruin the pelt.
auth_sentence.res_content: If I shoot it anywhere else it will ruin the pelt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If I shoot it anywhere else it will ruin the pelt.

sentences.en: We pelted our friends with snowballs.
The crowd pelted the mayor with angry questions.
sentences.cn: 那群人用愤怒的质问围攻市长。

sentences.en: He pelted toward the post office.
The boy gave the bully a pelt on the back with a pebble.
sentences.cn: 那男孩用石子掷击小流氓的背脊。

sentences.en: The police were chasing him so he ran full pelt down the road.
sentences.cn: 警察正在追捕他，他飞快地顺着马路逃跑。

sentences.en: We drove down the road at full tilt.
